happening by chance with no cause or reasonrandomIt was a random encounter between two long-lost friends.chanceA chance meeting brought them back together.arbitraryIt seems like the decision to cancel such a successful TV programme was completely arbitrary.haphazardHer cabinets were stuffed with a haphazard jumble of books, clothes, tins of soup, and papers.coincidentalAny similarity between the characters in this book and real people, living or dead, is purely coincidental.inadvertentA good editor will catch and correct all inadvertent typos in a text.
